TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
Urgh...

I\'m assuming that this is the same kind of full-server downtime there was yesterday, rather than *another* site going down for good. About how long was yesterday\'s downtime?

EDIT: Okay, something weird\'s going on. The site won\'t load on my PC (using chrome or firefox), but will load on my kindle, despite doing so ludicrously slowly (probably just because it\'s using EDGE.)

> 
> Urgh...
> 
> I\'m assuming that this is the same kind of full-server downtime there was yesterday, rather than *another* site going down for good. About how long was yesterday\'s downtime?
> 
> EDIT: Okay, something weird\'s going on. The site won\'t load on my PC (using chrome or firefox), but will load on my kindle, despite doing so ludicrously slowly (probably just because it\'s using EDGE.)

Yeah, my Firefox doesn\'t have any problems opening the forum.

Isn\'t it supposed to open in twenty minutes anyways?

> 
> Isn\'t it supposed to open in twenty minutes anyways?

Yes, but [Radion can\'t get on it either,](http://www.000webhost.com/forum/customer-assistance/30313-free-subdomain-off-after-working-day-before.html) so it\'s seems we might have to cancel that.
Aww. Well, here\'s to hoping.
Down on iOS. We really need to stop getting overused servers.

Seems to be working fine for me, on a Mac with Chrome. I haven\'t had any problems with it yet.

EDIT: Just looked in the \'who\'s online\' list, and apparently Radion managed to get it. Here\'s to hoping the issue was resolved for most people...
It seems that WiFi devices seemed to be affected the most by this conundrum. Luckily, the server is back online and working at full operation. We will commence roleplaying in 20 minutes.

It seems to work for a few people, pretty much at random. Luigibro\'s got the same ISP and internet package as me, and uses the same browser, but it works fine for him.

EDIT: Still not working for me.

DOUBLE EDIT: We still need GM point totals.
Of couse, now that we\'re a few minutes away from RP starting I can\'t get in :/ Probably just extra traffic because of said RP starting.

> 
> Of couse, now that we\'re a few minutes away from RP starting I can\'t get in :/ Probably just extra traffic because of said RP starting.

There are only 3 people online, strangely enough.

> 
> There are only 3 people online, strangely enough.

Is one of those me? Because I\'m not functionally online, thanks to crippled mobile browser.

> 
> Is one of those me? Because I\'m not functionally online, thanks to crippled mobile browser.

Nope. Just BHD124, Charzy, and me.

Ugh. Maybe I should try using Safari or Firefox, and see what happens.

EDIT: Okay, neither Safari nor Firefox yielded any better results; I can connect to every other site just fine, so it\'s not my computer being screwy...
Yeah, i have problems connecting to the site too.
Okay, I request that everyone please leave the site as I attempt to convert it from vanilla to SMF. Thank you.
Good luck. Will this mean a return to BB code?

> 
> Good luck. Will this mean a return to BB code?

Yes, it will.
That Vanilla was getting me awfully confused. Thanks for working absurd amounts of unpaid hours for us all!
So, another long waiting period?

> 
> So, another long waiting period?

Nah, just a PHP switch. I doubt that takes forever, but I cannot code anything!

Just keep your fingers crossed for a painless process for Radion, remember, its his time he\'s using to get this working ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
We know, and we\'re grateful. Nice 0th post.
what the link to the new rp site

> 
> what the link to the new rp site

[roleplaykerb.comlu.com](http://roleplaykerb.comlu.com) But to post on it, you need to pass the test and be approved by Radion.
Has RP begun yet?
